doc:
Chris Sarandon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chris_Sarandon 0 Christopher Sarandon Jr. (; born July 24, 1942) is an American actor. He is known best for playing Prince Humperdinck in the movie The Princess Bride, the vampire Jerry Dandrige in Fright Night, Detective Mike Norris in Child's Play (1988), and for providing the speaking voice of Jack Skellington in The Nightmare Before Christmas. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance as Leon Shermer in Dog Day Afternoon. Christopher_Sarandon_Jr. ( ; born July_24_,_1942 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known best for playing Prince_Humperdinck in the_movie The_Princess_Bride , the_vampire_Jerry_Dandrige in Fright_Night , Detective_Mike_Norris in Child 's_Play_(_1988_) , and for providing the_speaking_voice of Jack_Skellington in The_Nightmare Before Christmas . He was_nominated for an_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actor for his_performance as Leon_Shermer in Dog_Day_Afternoon .
